job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In today's digital world, the place where technology and business come together is the platform. The Business & Platform Solutions Division (B&PS) works with its clients to enable them to make the best out of their digital transformation. We support clients in their migration from classical application to the digital world. The scale of the changes brought by digitalization across all industries is radically reshaping the way our customers consume technology and services. Our customers are shifting their priorities and budgets to support digital initiatives and implement business-driven technologies. B&PS is to be the partner of choice and trusted advisor of Atos clients to address these objectives.

   The team

   In this dynamic position within Eviden you have lots of freedom and responsibility as part of a young and growing team, a lead role is expected. You will work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts on diverse data Architect projects, spanning different fields such as natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition. International travel can be an opportunity when willing.

   Within Atos there are many opportunities to further specialize yourself in the diverse field of Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture. Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.

   The role as a Data scientist

   As Data engineer/developer you will work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects to create insights that solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions.

   In the day to day activities you are facing clients with business demands to be translated into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations. These activities will be executed in a multi-disciplinary agile team and will lead to implementation and production.

   Furthermore, we expect leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues in their work.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer (DTC)

In today's digital world, the place where technology and business come together is the platform. The Business & Platform Solutions Division (B&PS) works with its clients to enable them to make the best out of their digital transformation. We support clients in their migration from classical application to the digital world. The scale of the changes brought by digitalization across all industries is radically reshaping the way our customers consume technology and services. Our customers are shifting their priorities and budgets to support digital initiatives and implement business-driven technologies. B&PS is to be the partner of choice and trusted advisor of Atos clients to address these objectives.

   The team

   In this dynamic position within Eviden you have lots of freedom and responsibility as part of a young and growing team, a lead role is expected. You will work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts on diverse data Architect projects, spanning different fields such as natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition. International travel can be an opportunity when willing.

   Within Atos there are many opportunities to further specialize yourself in the diverse field of Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture. Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.

   The role as a Data scientist

   As Data engineer/developer you will work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects to create insights that solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions.

   In the day to day activities you are facing clients with business demands to be translated into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations. These activities will be executed in a multi-disciplinary agile team and will lead to implementation and production.

   Furthermore, we expect leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues in their work.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on business transformation and client-facing consultancy rather than specific AI/ML engineering tasks. While it mentions NLP and time series modeling, it lacks the depth and specific technical requirements to classify it as an ML or GenAI Engineer role.

phrases: works with its clients to enable them to make the best out of their digital transformation
support clients in their migration from classical application to the digital world
address these objectives
create insights that solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions
facing clients with business demands to be translated into solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the role's focus on understanding client needs, digital transformation goals, and translating business problems into technical solutions.

phrases: diverse data Architect projects
Data Engineer (DTC)
Data engineer/developer
job_tasks.justification: The job title and mention of 'data Architect projects' directly point to data engineering responsibilities, though the specifics are vague.

phrases: natural language processing
time series modelling
image recognition
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate exposure to different modeling domains, but without details on development or fine-tuning, they are less central than business understanding.

phrases: implementation and production
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'implementation and production' suggests involvement in bringing solutions to a live state, which can involve software development aspects.
There are no specific phrases in the job description that directly relate to building and managing the infrastructure for deploying and maintaining ML/GenAI models in production.

phrases: work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts
work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects
knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected
multi-disciplinary agile team
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes working with various teams, sharing knowledge, and collaborating in a multidisciplinary environment.

phrases: create insights that solve business problems
business demands to be translated into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations
soft_skills.justification: The role requires translating business demands into actionable solutions and providing recommendations, indicating a problem-solving focus.

phrases: lots of freedom and responsibility
lead role is expected
leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues
soft_skills.justification: The job description mentions a lead role, freedom, responsibility, and leadership expectations, suggesting a need for ownership and initiative.

phrases: diverse data Architect projects, spanning different fields
many opportunities to further specialize yourself in the diverse field of Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture
soft_skills.justification: The mention of diverse projects and opportunities for specialization implies a need to learn and adapt to various data-related fields.
